turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I'm trying to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with an extra surname.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, an extra shot of espresso you said?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, just to let you know they will charge for an extra shot of espresso, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine. And I'd like to pick it up near near Pearlridge shopping center in Hawaii.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me find a location close to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i see there is a starbucks in pearlridge shopping center so i will send your order there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande caffe americano with an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. When can I pick it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you. Thank you. I'll go there now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, thank you.
